record.title: UNANIMOUS-CONSENT AGREEMENT--EXECUTIVE CALENDAR

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that at 12 noon tomorrow, the Senate proceed to executive session to consider Calendar No. 76, the nomination of Halil Suleyman Ozerden to be a U.S. district judge; that there be 10 minutes for debate equally divided between the chairman and ranking member or their designees; that at the conclusion or yielding back of the time, the Senate proceed to vote on that nomination; that the President be immediately notified of the Senate's action; and that the Senate then return to legislative session.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
